snippet: Marlies Schild of Austria stretched her winning streak to five consecutive World Cup slalom races, cruising to a victory in a night event in Zagreb, Croatia.
abstract: Austrian skier Marlies Schild wins her fifth consecutive World Cup slalom race at event in Zagreb, Croatia.
lead_paragraph: Marlies Schild of Austria stretched her winning streak to five consecutive World Cup slalom races, cruising to a victory in a night event in Zagreb, Croatia.

headline.main: Austria’s Schild Extends World Cup Hot Streak
headline.print_headline: Austria’s Schild Extends World Cup Hot Streak
